ygData.subject: Re: Off Topic: King Ak'anon
ygData.msgSnippet: To the best of my understanding, the Priest has a Staff of Writhing. It is a staff you can get in game, but is not made like that. The 2 Items in question are
ygData.messageBody:
To the best of my understanding, the Priest has a Staff of Writhing. It
is a staff you can get in game, but is not made like that. The 2 Items in
question are the Runed Totem Staff, and the Skull of Jen Tra. I may have
pelled it wrong, but them's the stuff!
Argynte
-----Original Message-----
From: DBellassai@... <DBellassai@...>
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>

Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Off Topic: King Ak'anon


>From: DBellassai@...

> Hmm ive heard that to but i talk to a friend on the pvp server and he
says

there
>is a third componet to combine to make this staff. To bad they wouldnt
say,
>also the priest discord has that black robe. When i first started i
thought

>people wear this robe. You can get that robe in a dungeon. I also tried
to
>combine the skull and rune totum staff and it tells me that they dont
>combine.
